preview.html: Seeing breastfeeding in a dream Breastfeeding is the process through which the child passes through the mother’s breast, as the child begins to suck milk inside the mother’s breast, and therefore breastfeeding is the basic breastfeeding process for children from the date of birth until they complete two years. Of course, females dream more than males for many reasons, some of which are still unknown, and many women dream of breastfeeding. God’s greatest gifts to the mother. In our article we explain to you the vision of breastfeeding in a dream on our distinguished website. Interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Breastfeeding a child in a dream is a sign of happy and good news. To dream of breastfeeding a male child indicates problems and anxiety. Seeing the inability to breastfeed the child In a dream, this is a sign of failure. Breastfeeding in a dream indicates the need for attention and tenderness. Seeing difficulty with breastfeeding is a sign that you are facing some difficulties and problems. Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream for a manSeeing an old man breastfeeding in a dream means bad news. Seeing a man On a woman's breast in a dream is a sign of good luck. Dreaming of a man breastfeeding a woman is a sign of imprisonment and deprivation of many important things in his life. If a man sees in a dream that he is breastfeeding a child, this is good for him. Seeing a man breastfeeding can be In a dream, it is a sign of his sexual desires. Seeing small breasts in a dream indicates the difficulties that a man faces in his life. Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream for a married woman: Dreaming of a married woman breastfeeding her son is a sign that the problems she is going through will end and she will be lucky. If a woman sees in a dream A man is breastfeeding her and she knows him well, this indicates that he will take her money unjustly. Filling a woman’s breasts with milk is beneficial for her. Breastfeeding a child in a dream indicates good news. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding a child and is sad, this is harmful to her. A married woman A woman who is breastfeeding a child in a dream is a sign of pregnancy in the near future. Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream breastfeeding her child, and that was in the first months of her pregnancy, indicates that the fetus will have great importance and authority. Seeing a pregnant woman breastfeeding her child In a dream, it is a sign of a trouble-free birth. Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream for a single woman: Breastfeeding in a dream is beneficial for her. If you dream of an unmarried woman being breastfed by a man, this is bad and she will get sick. If a girl sees that she is breastfeeding a child, this indicates her marriage contract. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a baby girl in a dream: If a woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a baby girl while in reality she is suffering from an illness, then this vision is a good omen for her short recovery, God willing. If a woman sees in her dream how she is breastfeeding her baby, this indicates a bright future and the achievement of her goals and dreams. But if A pregnant woman dreams that she is breastfeeding a baby girl, then this indicates an easy birth. If an elderly person sees in his dream that he is breastfeeding a baby, this indicates that he will hear news.

title: 7 meanings and clues to seeing cookies in a dream, which symbolize broad nutrition

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing sweet cookies? Evidence that sustenance comes to you through money or marriage. What does it mean to see salted cookies? Evidence of honesty in work and marital life. What is the interpretation of seeing a cookie made in a circular shape? Its meaning is the return of blessings Old that you have missed the purpose of seeing cookies and crackers? This means that a lot of nutrition is coming to your home. Interpretation of seeing cookies for a pregnant woman? A symbol of easy placement. Interpretation of seeing cookiesCookies are sweet in shape and have a sweet taste, and they are a source of livelihood that comes to you with money or Marriage. Seeing that eating cookies is not good, because it means the deterioration of your health and can symbolize family discord. Baked cookies, means piety and fear, and perhaps faith in work and married life. Then seeing salty cookies also means that you are troubled by problems and obstacles and cannot Finding a way or solution to it. A sweet cookie means halal profit, good news, or good work. Seeing cookies in a dream about Nabulsi. Nabulsi said about a dream about biscuits that it is good provided that you feel happy while eating it, but it is bad and bad if you feel disgusted and repulsed by the sting of a cookie. Cookie: If the cookie is made in a circular shape, it means the return of old lost blessings. It also means successful travel and expatriation, and you will gain good from your expatriation. Seeing cookies in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing cookies for a virgin girl means marriage if it tastes sweet. Cookies mean Money that was saved for her for a while, but she did not take this money or forget about it. It is said that cookies are worth twice the livelihood you are worth, you can get a job with twice the salary that you are used to. Dream of a cookie for a married womanBuying cookies from a store means benefit Great for a married woman in reality. Then seeing sweet cookies means a sweet life that you will live with your husband. Then seeing a cookie and its crunch, means that a lot of food is coming to your house. Round cookies mean dinars or dirhams. Then seeing all the cookies Sugar is good for a married woman. After that, when you see that you are eating cookies greedily, it may mean illness near you, because frequent consumption of sweets means illness. Distributing cookies in a dreamIf someone dreams of distributing cookies to another person, it means that His place in the heart of his loved ones from family and neighbors will rise, because feeding others brings joy and happiness to their hearts. Whereas if someone gives you a cookie, you will win your business or get a new job. Then seeing giving cookies in a dream If a husband gives his wife cookies in a dream , it means that she will become pregnant soon. A dream about biscuits for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a profile of confusion

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Christmas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see Christmas in a dream through the Moments website. Interpretation of Christmas and gifts in a dream differs only in the fortuneteller’s vision, and this means that the meaning is recognized in the event that the girl is unmarried, married, a mirror, or pregnant. The dreamer suffers or is afflicted with a disease, as God has confirmed the existence of two Eids. Only for the believer is the threat of Eid al-Fitr. The appearance of Christmas in a dream is one of the undesirable topics that indicates arrogance, showing off about one of the topics, showing off and constant exaggeration, and when you see the celebration of personal birthdays, it may mean the misfortunes that the person overcomes, and evidence of the crises and obstacles that he is going through. Via.Interpretation of a dream about Christmas, which - seeing Christmas in a dream, especially that watching dancing on Christmas days for the sin committed by a person is evidence that the person is suffering from sins and is exposed to a serious sin, and thus it shows him that he is suffering from serious problems that affect him in his life and that the dreamer is suffering One of the grave sins. Interpretation of seeing gifts in a dream. Scientists and commentators confirm that seeing gifts in a dream can mean goodness, happiness, and abundance of sustenance that God has obtained, and that he may advance in his work and obtain goodness, abundant living, a pleasant life, psychological comfort, happiness, and money that a person acquires. Interpretation of a dream about Christmas By Ibn Sirin Ibn Shirin Watching seeing Christmas in a dream can show the adversities and obstacles that the god is suffering from, and when the god is welcoming Christmas, he will suffer from obstacles and problems in life. In the event that he eats food on Christmas, this may mean that he will suffer from a disease, and in the event that The presence of a person at the birthday of someone he does not know indicates that the dreamer is living in a period full of troubles and sins and that he is afflicted with an illness. Interpretation of a dream about Christmas for single people: An unmarried woman who sees a birthday in a dream, this can be a sign of kindness, especially if She saw that people were flocking to her house and bringing gifts offered to her, and this indicates engagement and happiness and affects the close marriage of this unmarried girl, and it can mean close marriage and freedom from problems and obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about Christmas for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream on the occasion of Christmas means That her affairs are going for the better and indicates recovery from diseases and getting rid of problems in life and portends to the fortuneteller change and surprise, because the word “birthday” expresses happiness. And psychological comfort, as it alleviates problems and obstacles in life, portends the return, psychological comfort, calm and consolation that the viewer obtains, and indicates the approaching pregnancy of the woman.

title: Interpretation of nosebleeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Advance EncyclopediaInterpretation of nosebleeds in a dreamIt is known as nosebleeds or nosebleeds, and it is one of the pathological symptoms of various diseases, including high blood pressure, which often results from excessive excitement and excessive nervousness. He may not actually have these symptoms, which makes his question about why he sees this blood in a dream more urgent. There is no dispute about the extent to which dreams are related to the dreamer's life, which has appeared for a long time, as the Prophet of God Joseph was famous for his ability to interpret visions since his childhood, which his father did to tell him what God Almighty said in his beloved book in Surat Yusuf verse 5 (He said: O my son, do not tell your brothers about your vision. They will conspire against you) and his ability to interpret dreams was the reason for his salvation from injustice and oppression. Getting out of prison to assume prestigious positions and become popular in Egypt, we present to you in the following paragraphs the interpretation of all cases of nosebleeds. Interpretation of nosebleeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin The prominent scholar Ibn Sirin says about the following indications of nosebleeds, which differ from the good interpretations and other indications to the contrary: I mean nosebleeds, but not the profuse bleeding of forbidden money that the fortune teller obtains from an illegitimate source from which he raises his children, or that it symbolizes the extent of his committing sins and disobedience, and he must repent and return to truth and justice. God's way. Bleeding from one of the nostrils without the other indicates the end of a problem in the dreamer's life that was bothering him and disturbing his comfort. Severe nosebleeds symbolize the end of anxiety and crises, and the condition of the dreamer has changed for the better than it was before. Bleeding from his surroundings and was transparent, light and little indicates that the dreamer will benefit and live, and it can be embodied in money or work from which he earns money and a large profit by the command of God. Thick, sticky blood symbolizes a problem and torment that the dreamer is going through in the coming period of his life, and he will not be able to overcome it and escape from it without God's help in that. As Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a nosebleed can be related to the passage of emotions, feelings and tendencies of the viewer. If he is going through happiness and joy, the nosebleed is interpreted accordingly, but if he is going through sadness and distress, the interpretation of the dream will follow. As mentioned above, and God knows best. Bleeding with a feeling of relief after the blood flow stops symbolizes the dissolution of a knot and the end of the dreamer's worries, and God knows best. It is an undesirable sign for this dream. Seeing that the nosebleed has caused the dreamer's clothes to be soiled, and the weaker his body, it may indicate the loss and disappearance of blessings and poverty, God forbid. Interpretation of blood coming out of the nose in a dream for a single woman In the following points, we explain to you what a single woman sees bleeding from her nose in a dream: The blood was bleeding from her nose, and it was profuse and abundant, affecting her clothes, and she could not stop it because she went through some hardships and troubles that caused her distress and sadness. The blood coming out of the nose and its descent to the ground indicates the girl's sin, and this dream is a warning message to stop it and repent to God Almighty. And the transparent bleeding that does not touch the dress and the woman
preview.text: Advance EncyclopediaInterpretation of nosebleeds in a dreamIt is known as nosebleeds or nosebleeds, and it is one of the pathological symptoms of various diseases, including high blood pressure, which often results from excessive excitement and excessive nervousness. He may not actually have these symptoms, which makes his question about why he sees this blood in a dream more urgent. There is no dispute about the extent to which dreams are related to the dreamer's life, which has appeared for a long time, as the Prophet of God Joseph was famous for his ability to interpret visions since his childhood, which his father did to tell him what God Almighty said in his beloved book in Surat Yusuf verse 5 (He said: O my son, do not tell your brothers about your vision. They will conspire against you) and his ability to interpret dreams was the reason for his salvation from injustice and oppression. Getting out of prison to assume prestigious positions and become popular in Egypt, we present to you in the following paragraphs the interpretation of all cases of nosebleeds. Interpretation of nosebleeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin The prominent scholar Ibn Sirin says about the following indications of nosebleeds, which differ from the good interpretations and other indications to the contrary: I mean nosebleeds, but not the profuse bleeding of forbidden money that the fortune teller obtains from an illegitimate source from which he raises his children, or that it symbolizes the extent of his committing sins and disobedience, and he must repent and return to truth and justice. God's way. Bleeding from one of the nostrils without the other indicates the end of a problem in the dreamer's life that was bothering him and disturbing his comfort. Severe nosebleeds symbolize the end of anxiety and crises, and the condition of the dreamer has changed for the better than it was before. Bleeding from his surroundings and was transparent, light and little indicates that the dreamer will benefit and live, and it can be embodied in money or work from which he earns money and a large profit by the command of God. Thick, sticky blood symbolizes a problem and torment that the dreamer is going through in the coming period of his life, and he will not be able to overcome it and escape from it without God's help in that. As Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a nosebleed can be related to the passage of emotions, feelings and tendencies of the viewer. If he is going through happiness and joy, the nosebleed is interpreted accordingly, but if he is going through sadness and distress, the interpretation of the dream will follow. As mentioned above, and God knows best. Bleeding with a feeling of relief after the blood flow stops symbolizes the dissolution of a knot and the end of the dreamer's worries, and God knows best. It is an undesirable sign for this dream. Seeing that the nosebleed has caused the dreamer's clothes to be soiled, and the weaker his body, it may indicate the loss and disappearance of blessings and poverty, God forbid. title: Know the interpretation of a dream about blue by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of the blue dream A sign of goodness that will reach the dreamer's life and a number of other interpretations mentioned by the great interpreters led by Ibn Sirin Today, through the Secrets of Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss the interpretations with you in detail. Interpretation of the dream of the color blue Ibn Shaheen explained that the blue color in a dream is one of the desired visions that indicate that the dreamer has achieved all his goals and aspirations, but if you see blue clothes sometimes, this vision indicates that he will receive a large amount of unpleasant news that brings anxiety and sadness to the dreamer's life. Seeing the dark blue color in a dream indicates the possibility of the dreamer moving to a new place, a new country, either for work or to complete his studies. Seeing the indigo color means that the dreamer has a pure heart and is very close to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of the color blue by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the color blue is evidence of stability and achieving goals, whatever they may be, and the dreamer's ability to deal with obstacles and obstacles that appear in his life from time to time. Interpretation of the dream of the color blue for a single woman Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a blue dress in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that symbolizes that she will enjoy security and peace in her life and will enjoy calm and psychological comfort and will be able to get rid of all her worries and problems that currently dominate her life. The color blue in a single dream is a sign that she is active and energetic in her life, and the color blue indicates the dreamer's constant desire to obtain money, so he enters into many deals and projects with the aim of earning more money. The color blue in a single woman's dream indicates a trip soon to do some work, but if she is still a student, the dream foretells that she will achieve great success in her academic life. A dream of a long blue dress for single women decorated with blue sapphires is a sign of protection and health. Interpretation of the dream of the color blue for a woman Married Seeing the color blue for a married woman is a sign that she will enjoy a lot of kindness and food in her life, but if the color is dark, this indicates evil in the dreamer's life, and he will achieve a lot of material gains. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is wearing a blue suit, this is a sign that her husband will achieve great success in his work or will soon get a promotion in his work. Gratitude to everyone around her Seeing the color blue in a dream is a sign of peace and stability that will prevail in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about the color blue for a pregnant woman The color blue in a pregnant woman's dream is an indication of the abundance of goodness in her life, and the dream of the color blue for a pregnant woman is a sign that God Almighty will give her a boy, and if the color blue is dark, it indicates that the birth will be full of problems and difficulties. The color blue in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign that her life will be full of love and care. Seeing the color blue in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that the fortune teller

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new home for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about a new home for a pregnant woman One of the beautiful visions that when seen for a woman promises a lot of goodness, joy and confidence, because it is evidence of the ease of childbirth without pain.Interpretation of a dream about a new home for a pregnant woman according to NabulsiImam Nabulsi will interpret this dream for a pregnant woman in several ways, as follows If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she moved to her father’s house and the house was new, this indicates that one of her parents was suffering from some illness and pain and that God had healed him. Whereas, if the pregnant woman saw that the house she moved to was new and beautiful and that she felt happy in it After settling down, this is strong evidence of abundant food, a lot of money and children. As for a pregnant woman who sees that the old house she lived in in her husband’s house has moved to a new and more spacious house than before, this is a good possibility for the large amount that the husband will earn. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that the place surrounding her house is decorated with green and has become beautiful, and covered with trees and flowers from everywhere, this means that distress and unhappiness will go away. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she saw her new house with some cracks and defects, and she regrets her happiness, then she She will suffer from pain during childbirth. The new house in a pregnant woman’s dream, if it is beautiful in all its aspects, but its windows were not present or broken, then this indicates that the pregnant woman was robbed by someone she does not know. But if it became the pregnant woman’s new home In the past, this vision indicated that her condition would change for the worse, or that her husband would lose his job from which he earned a lot of money. While a pregnant woman sees in her dream as if her house is flying in the sky and that she is in it and happiness overflows from every direction, this vision is evidence of the tremendous goodness that He will find it. And the pregnant woman who has a new house in her dream, even though she is poor and cannot obtain it, this indicates that the future provides for her, her husband, and her children. Interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous people who interpreted a woman’s dream in her dream about her new homeland, as follows If a pregnant woman moves all of her possessions from her old house to a new house, but she does not know who is the owner of that house to which she moved, then this is evidence of the goodness that will befall her from a benevolent benefactor. But if her new house turns into a ruin inhabited by crows of birds and spiders, then This vision indicates that this pregnant woman is of bad character, gossipers a lot, and commits sins. But if the pregnant woman sees in her dream that she and her husband have moved to a new house, and that the house is ruined, then after they entered it it became a building, then this is evidence of their piety. If she sees A pregnant woman dreams that the new house she went to live in was new, but made entirely of clay, then this is evidence that her money is of good legal origin, despite its scarcity. But if the pregnant woman sees in her dream that the new house she bought from...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a funeral by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a funeral? A funeral is the ceremony of bidding farewell to the dead by washing and covering him, then praying over him, or what is known as the funeral prayer. We also refer to the punishment for committing many sins without repentance, and then we find in this vision many. Interpretations It is important for us to mention at length the meaning of seeing a funeral in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a funeral in a dream Seeing a funeral in a dream symbolizes repentance or a continuation of the act of disobedience and fear of a sad end. The funeral may be a reference to hypocrites who seek to corrupt people, mislead them from the truth, and pollute their minds. With heresies and superstitions. If people follow the funeral, this indicates the eminence of the dreamer, assuming high positions, elevating the subjects and giving orders. As for the dreamer seeing in his dream that he is praying with the people at a funeral, this indicates that he guides the people to the path of righteousness and takes them as his brothers in religion. But seeing the coffin and no one carrying it at the funeral is a sign of imprisonment and restrictions that prevent the dreamer from moving and achieving his goal. And whoever sees it being carried on the shoulders of men, this is evidence of his great status, his closeness to kings and sultans, the abundance of his money, and the benefits he reaps from it. The courtiers of the sultans. If he fell from his coffin, this means that the fortuneteller will lose his possession and waste his efforts and the time he spends in reaching his current location. Seeing a funeral procession on the ground is a sign of travel or movement by sea and boarding ships. As for seeing many funeral processions left on On the ground, this indicates that his people have committed immorality without remorse or repentance. And if he sees a funeral flying in the air, this symbolizes the death of distinguished scholars and kings, or those who die on their way, such as travel, Hajj, and jihad. However, if he is in the market, this indicates his color and animal. The world. And if people are walking at a funeral, this is a sign of the injustice that people are exposed to and the power that the undertaker has, so he subjugates them to work with him and oppresses them. According to Miller’s Encyclopedia, we find that watching a funeral has different meanings and can be summarized in five points as follows: FuneralThe funeral indicates To an unhappy marriage or a failed relationship and a lack of love between the two parties, and the funeral can symbolize widowhood, loss, loneliness, and a psychological state that gets worse day by day. If the funeral is for a family member, the vision may symbolize family problems and strife imposed on the bond between the dreamer and his relatives. Miller believes that the dreamer who sees that he has left his work to attend the funeral will give up some of his work to pursue fleeting whims or worldly matters that will not benefit him at all, but will miss him greatly. Opportunities. A funeral could be a sign of falling into temptation, believing rumors, and sacrificing honor in exchange for false statements and beliefs that do not exist. Ibn Shaheen had more than one interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream. This opinion can be formulated as follows: The vision is a sign of wonderful travel and wandering that compels the viewer To constantly search for things that may have no basis in truth

title: More than 100 interpretations of a dream about raw fish by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about raw fish: Fish is considered a beneficial meat for humans. It cannot be neglected because of its great importance to the body, as it is cooked in different forms, such as fried and grilled. Follow us. What is the interpretation of a dream about raw fish? Seeing raw fish in a dream indicates the abundance of sustenance from the Lord of the Worlds, as God will honor it with endless joy and abundance. If it is roasted, this confirms that he is seeking to obtain money through forbidden and not legal means, but if it is not roasted This is evidence of his relationship with an ideal partner as he desires. Fishing in a dream is a very happy and beautiful omen from the Lord of the Worlds. God grants his life and expands for him greatly, even if what he catches is a large number of large numbers, it will bypass the blessing he receives. From his Lord. If he has a desire that he seeks to fulfill but he is unable to do so, then this indicates his inability to achieve his desire in life due to his weakness and lack of resourcefulness. The salt fish has a happy connotation in the vision for all people, as we find that he is blessed with abundant profits in his work, which makes him live in peace. A very comfortable financial condition. If the dreamer sees that someone is giving it to him in his dream, this indicates that he helps him with all his worries and problems and will not leave him alone no matter what. The type of fish changes the meaning, as we see that the shark in the dream expresses some harm that the dreamer may be exposed to. , especially if he manages to bite him, then an enemy wants to harm him and disrupt his life. If he talks to the priest in the vision, this is a sign of the emergence of secrets in the dreamer’s life that he did not want to reveal now, but we find that he will reach a huge diet that will make him very happy. His presence in the sea Certain evidence that he wants to achieve many goals, but he cannot achieve them because he does not have the right path and the right thinking to reach them. Raw fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees in this dream an expression of the dreamer’s abundant livelihood, as God gives him a lot of money that makes him happy. In his life. We also find that there is another evil meaning, which is the presence of some enemies who hate him for good all the time, and look at him every step he takes in his life. The vision shows the qualities of the woman who could be his wife in the vision, as if the fish is fresh in appearance, it appears Her morals are good and there is nothing wrong with her behavior, but if she is bad, then it indicates her bad morals, which greatly disturbs the dreamer. If he eats it while in this situation without cooking it, then this is evidence that the dreamer is hostile to those who hate him and is not comfortable with him, but if he eats from it, this foretells some Problems. Because of this person. If the dreamer has worries in his life, his vision is that he will remove them in the coming period, and if he makes a mistake in his life, then he will bypass many sins and not give up in reality. The vision confirms that there are problems in the dreamer’s life and that he has made many attempts to avoid worries. Which he lives and which makes him unhappy no matter how much he tries to hide it. There is no doubt that the vision is a warning from God Almighty to warn the dreamer of all the enemies who are waiting for him without his knowledge, and they seek to spoil his life and all the happiness in it. Seeing raw fish in a dream is from Nablus.
